root.name: Half-Life Deathmatch: Source
root.description: While this game is in the Half-Life series it is not part of the continuous story of the franchise thanks to it being a multiplayer only game. It is a remake of Half- Life's mutiplayer component, Deathmatch Classic, using the Source Engine. It has recieved a backlash for little graphical updates (only water and ragdolls are the most notable difference), changes in physics and has a very tiny userbase.
